## Bug Report

### Steps to Reproduce:
 1. Run the generator with the profile below
 2. Ensure interesting generation is enabled and combining exhaustively

```
{
	"schemaVersion": "v3",
	"fields": [
		{ "name": "field1" }
	],
	"rules": [
		{ 
			"rule": "field1",
			"constraints": [
				{
					"field": "field1",
					"is": "greaterThan",
					"value": -1000.0
				},
				{
					"field": "field1",
					"is": "ofType",
					"value": "numeric"
				}
			]
		}			
	]
}
```

### Expected Result:
We would expect the following 5 values (see #509 for why there are 5 values currently expected)

| field1 | 
| ---- |
| -1001 |
| -1002 |
| 0 |
|  |
|  |

i.e. two values at the extreme of the range and 0

### Actual Result:

The following data is emitted:

| field1 | 
| ---- |
| 0 |
| 1000 |
|  |
|  |
